text: Paul Jones was a elected chairman of the Navajo Tribal Council in 1955 and re- elected in 1959. On March 4, 1963 he was defeated by Raymond Nakai. Paul Jones - (October 27, 1895- November 7, 1971) ==References== *Lafarge, Oliver. (MCMLVI). A Pictorial History of the American Indian. Crown Publishers Inc. Page 235. *"Long 'Sleep' Ends For U.S. Navajos", Calgary Herald, December 7, 1960 *Paul Jones' obituary Category:Chairmen of the Navajo Tribe Category:1895 births Category:1971 deaths
title: Paul Jones (Navajo Chairman)
